def_cn: （尤指向前）突然一蹿，突然急动
def_en: To lurch means to make a sudden movement, especially forwards, in an uncontrolled way.

def_cn: （在不同的行动、态度之间）左冲右撞，摇摆不定
def_en: If you say that a person or organization lurches from one thing to another, you mean they move suddenly from one course of action or attitude to another in an uncontrolled way.

def_cn: 弃…于危难之中；对…坐视不救
def_en: If someone leaves you in the lurch, they go away or stop helping you at a very difficult time.
